title: Update Footer social media links with actual URLs

requirements.summary: Update Footer component social media links to use actual URLs for Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, and WhatsApp channel
acceptanceCriteria: Footer component displays four social media links with correct URLs
Facebook link opens https://www.facebook.com/share/14pG6fyhTk/ in a new tab
YouTube link opens https://youtube.com/@brilliantcoachingcentre-hh6pj?si=YAroyIX3xHzTZABl in a new tab
Instagram link opens https://www.instagram.com/c.brilliantcoaching?igsh=YzljYTk1ODg3Zg== in a new tab
WhatsApp channel link opens https://whatsapp.com/channel/0029Vb32rw8JENxvzIshPI1W in a new tab
All links maintain existing icon styling and bilingual label support
Links are clickable and properly formatted with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer'

file_operations.description: Update the social media links section to replace placeholder or existing URLs with the actual URLs: Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/share/14pG6fyhTk/), YouTube (https://youtube.com/@brilliantcoachingcentre-hh6pj?si=YAroyIX3xHzTZABl), Instagram (https://www.instagram.com/c.brilliantcoaching?igsh=YzljYTk1ODg3Zg==), and WhatsApp channel (https://whatsapp.com/channel/0029Vb32rw8JENxvzIshPI1W). Ensure all links open in new tabs with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer' attributes. Preserve existing icon styling, hover effects, and bilingual label support using LanguageContext.
